verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
You can have all this world
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
You can have all this world
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give me the One my soul delights in
Give me the One in whom my hope is securely found

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give me the One my soul delights in
Give me the One in whom my hope is securely,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Give me the One my soul delights in
Give me the One in whom my hope is securely found

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Give me the One my soul delights in
Give me the One in whom my hope is securely,

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
you can have all this world
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
you can have all this world
give me Jesus
